profile.name: Janith Waduge
profile.title: System Architect & Full Stack Developer
profile.bio: Based in the historic city of Anuradhapura, I am a software engineer driven by the challenge of turning complex logic into secure, reliable systems. My journey began with a deep dive into academic fundamentals and evolved into building enterprise-grade tools like my Agency Management System. I founded W2 Tech Solutions to bridge the gap between high-end architecture and user-focused reliability.
profile.quote: Code is not just logic; it's a commitment to security and reliability.
profile.headline: Secure tools to organize your [[Busines]] and empower your next move.
